DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A natural number greater than 13 and less than 15 and the quantity that it denotes._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._Earlier in time or order._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._A positive-sense single-stranded RNA virus in the genus Betacoronavirus. It is the causative agent of the 2019-2020 severe acute respiratory syndrome outbreak._The start, beginning, or early stages._The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience.
